OOC: I hate to do this....but I really dont want to see my old base 
destroyed. And, I know Ive been out of it, so if this is wrong in any way 
please let me know.

    Adrax looked down on the bots gathering around the base he only 
remembered as Hell Beast's. He scanned them, he knew one of them as Megatron.
    Still in beast mode, he opened his mouth and his gapling gun extended. 
Adrax then let it rain bullets from the sky towrds Megatron and his commrads.
